detectors.description: Referrals.random(Referrals.Data,uint256,uint256) (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0x084fe7aa7b09e539ecbad29dbce00fce1aeab183-BFF.sol#557-559) uses a weak PRNG: min + uint256(keccak256(bytes)(abi.encodePacked(block.difficulty,block.timestamp,data.currentRefferralCode))) % (max - min + 1) (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0x084fe7aa7b09e539ecbad29dbce00fce1aeab183-BFF.sol#558)
